name: DOGTOOLS
description:
"It's a dog versus dog world... except in the future they're machines."

Play as Mortimer, fighting for your life dismantling DOGBOTS with your DOGTOOLS: a high-knockback NAILGUN & freakish, robot-crushing GIRTH.

Go Mortimer! Go!

Controls

LEFT, RIGHT - [ A, S ]

JUMP, SLAM - [ W, S ]

AIM & FIRE - [ LEFT MOUSE ]

RESIZE WINDOW (Desktop) - [1, 2, 3, 4]

Made by Yokin &  RENREN in about a day for the November Duos Microjam [Ongoing].

OST - https://mistajub.bandcamp.com/track/dogtools
Font - https://damieng.com/typography/zx-origins/zx-rustproof/
